com.markussecundus.forms.elements.impl.layouts

Class BasicAbstractLayout<Rend,Pos,Scalar extends java.lang.Comparable<Scalar>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.markussecundus.forms.extensibility.IExtensible
      • com.markussecundus.forms.elements.impl.BasicAbstractDrawableElem<Rend,Pos,Scalar>
        • com.markussecundus.forms.elements.impl.layouts.BasicAbstractLayout<Rend,Pos,Scalar>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DrawableElem<Rend,Pos>, Element, UberDrawable<Rend,Pos>, UberElement, Extensible, Drawable<Rend,Pos>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasicGridLayout, BasicLinearLayout, PrimitivePositionalLayout

    public abstract class BasicAbstractLayout<Rend,Pos,Scalar extends java.lang.Comparable<Scalar>>
extends BasicAbstractDrawableElem<Rend,Pos,Scalar>
implements UberDrawable<Rend,Pos>
    Basic base class for all Layouts. Provides the default size behavior (as in BasicAbstractDrawableElem) and basic logic for containment and management of children and their relative positions.
    Author:
    MarkusSecundus
    See Also:
    UberElement, UberDrawable, BasicLinearLayout, PrimitivePositionalLayout, DefaultSizeBehavior, ElementLists

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected class  BasicAbstractLayout.ChildPosition
      Data class for containing both the ReadonlyProperty of child size and its setter.
      protected class  BasicAbstractLayout.ChildrenListeners
      Container class for all the listeners, that are automatically added to the delegates on childrenContainer, to make them easily refferentiable and possibly able to be deleted from the particular delegate if necessary.
      static class  BasicAbstractLayout.LayoutTooShortException
      Thrown on recomputation of the children positions when the children do not fit into the layout.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.markussecundus.forms.extensibility.Extensible

        Extensible.ImplementationThroughMemoryLeak

      • CHILDREN_LISTENERS

        protected final BasicAbstractLayout.ChildrenListeners CHILDREN_LISTENERS
        The instance of BasicAbstractLayout.ChildrenListeners belonging to the particular instance of BasicAbstractLayout.

      • childrenContainer

        protected final ElementLists.Delegated<Rend,Pos> childrenContainer
        The component to which the logic for children containment is delegated. On construction already has basic listeners added, that remove any sizeConstraint from a child when it is removed, and bind the drawable children with their size Property as a tag.
        See Also:
        ElementLists

      • childPositionsContainer

        protected final java.util.Map<DrawableElem<Rend,Pos>,BasicAbstractLayout.ChildPosition> childPositionsContainer
        Stores positions of drawable children. Key... the drawable child Value... its position

        maxSize - default value for maxSize Property
        minSize - default value for minSize Property
        prefSize - default value for prefSize Property
        posUtil - VectUtil for the vector type used

    • Method Detail

      • drawableChildren

        public ConstProperty<java.util.List<DrawableElem<Rend,Pos>>> drawableChildren()
        Description copied from interface: UberDrawable
        Instance of List containing only and all the children, that are to be drawn on the screen. Use it to add children to this, to remove them or to change their arrangement in any other way possible. All the children in here will be automatically present also in children. Try to avoid simultaneous modifications of both the lists.
        Specified by:
        drawableChildren in interface UberDrawable<Rend,Pos>
        See Also:
        ElementLists

      • children

        public ConstProperty<java.util.List<Element>> children()
        Description copied from interface: UberElement
        Instance of List containing only and all the children, that are to be updated in the game loop. Use it to add children to this, to remove them or to change their arrangement in any other way possible.
        Specified by:
        children in interface UberElement

      • childPosition

        public ReadonlyProperty<Pos> childPosition(DrawableElem<Rend,Pos> child)
        Description copied from interface: UberDrawable
        Returns the position of child relative to the parent (this). Can return null if child isn't really the child of this.
        Specified by:
        childPosition in interface UberDrawable<Rend,Pos>
        Parameters:

      • draw

        public boolean draw(Rend renderer,
                    Pos position)
        Renders drawable children on their associated positions relative to position parameter. Called each frame, renders the Drawable on the screen.
        Specified by:
        draw in interface DrawableElem<Rend,Pos>
        Specified by:
        draw in interface Drawable<Rend,Pos>
        Parameters:
        renderer - The instance of Rend using which the Drawable is to be rendered
        position - The position on which the Drawable is supposed to be drawn. By convention should define the leftmost-downmost edge of the rectangle circumscribed to the this if in 2D space

        protected java.util.Map<DrawableElem<Rend,Pos>,BasicAbstractLayout.ChildPosition> MAKE_CONTAINER_FOR_CHILD_POSITIONS()
